mapper.insert: insert into dish (name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name}, #{categoryId}, #{price}, #{image}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select d.id as dish_id, d.name as dish_name, d.category_id, d.price, d.image, d.description, d.status, d.update_time, c.name as category_name, df.id as flavor_id, df.dish_id, df.name as flavor_name, df.value as flavor_value from dish d left join category c on d.category_id = c.id left join dish_flavor df on d.id = df.dish_id where d.id = #{id}
